review: This product is a nightmare. It constantly freezes. All. The. Time. I never have this problem with my Apple, only this. Ive done every troubleshooting option and it still is horrible. Worse is the remote! Jeeeezzzz the remote is a NIGHTMARE. It is nearly impossible getting the back off. Im not exaggerating. So not worth it. Significantly cheaper than the Apple but man do you get what you pay for. And thats nothing. Wish I bought a second Apple, dont know what you have good till you get something horrible like this.
author: HappyAuntie

review: I refuse to pay for cable, i have a netflix & Hulu account and i use both frequently. I would connect my laptop via hdmi to my tv so that i could watch on a big screen, but that was just a hassle when i had to disconnect it to use my laptop, I considered buying a smart tv, but didn't really want to spend that kind of money and my tv is only a few years old. So after researching the Fire stick i decided to give it a shot.I LOVE IT!!!!! I'm so glad i made this purchase. Now i can watch Netflix & Hulu on my living room tv, not to mention access to my Amazon Prime stuff as well Thanks AMAZON!
